recipesJson.name: Butterscotch Cake | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, Graham, Folkart, and guest Tam Vapes . 
This is our version of a Butterscotch Cake.  This recipe is similar to a German Chocolate Cake, but with butterscotch and not chocolate.   Full Development Notes at https://youtu.be/bQlEXBxlThw .
Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

reviews.text: I mixed 60ml and let it steep for a week, it was really good then and i went through about 30ml of it before putting it aside. Went back a couple weeks later and it got even better. The cake is way more forward, the butterscotch ripple molds its way into everything, the coconut is pushed back more, and the texture is still completely there. Pretty cool. And very tasty.
